content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=BME-HE-NETWORK&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=BME-HE-NETWORK&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>BME-HE-NETWORK List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BME-HE-NETWORK</link>  <description>BME-HE-NETWORK List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-12-16T19:26:33Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a8be9cbd.1412"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;7e432774.1409"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a73d79c8.1408"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;63d16f32.1404"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a8be9cbd.1412">   <title>Publishing Opportunity - and something to occupy you over the Christmas / New Year break! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a8be9cbd.1412</link>   <description> Dear Friends<br><br>This is a chase-up 'call' to ask if anyone has papers they'd like published in the journal Diversity .... we're trying to get it back on track now!<br><br>I understand that some people have been a bit concerned about our move to the "Open Access, Author Pays" model. Personally, I can understand that - as I've always found it hard to raise the extra costs from my University - but equally, many people object to not being able top access the journal articles because their University or other Institute does not pay a subscription! Consequently, journals and publishers [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T19:26:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mark Johnson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a8be9cbd.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;7e432774.1409">   <title>Invitation to UCL's BHM events </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;7e432774.1409</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>I invite you to UCL and UCL Union\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Black History Month 2014 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd with the theme: past, present, future. Registration for events is now open at http://uclu.org/bhm.<br><br>Looking to the past and also focusing on the present, we are holding exciting lectures uncovering When we Ruled, The Rise and Fall of Black Wall Street and A Global Perspective on BHM, guided tours, and panel events discussing issues around intersectionality. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-23T15:15:26+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Hajera Begum</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;7e432774.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a73d79c8.1408">   <title>FW: A message to reviewers from Qualitative Health Research </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a73d79c8.1408</link>   <description> I must say I do get a lot of requests from this journal, and would welcome some others to share the load! The papers are often quite good and interesting, and it is good for you/me to read what others are publishing - sometimes to be able to suggest that they read something they've missed from the UK scholarship! Don't reply to me - send a CV to QHR to join their list of reviewers! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-01T09:21:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mark Johnson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;a73d79c8.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;63d16f32.1404">   <title>Fw: HERAG's 1st Race Equality Think Tank: Call for proposals From Studenship to Professorship </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;63d16f32.1404</link>   <description> looks like something for the BME-HE network!<br><br>Prof. Mark R D Johnson<br>Director, MSRC / CEEHD<br>De Montfort University, Hawthorn Building<br>The Gateway, Leicester LE1 9BH<br>----- Original Message -----<br>From: Okhai, Leyla<br>To: MINORITY-ETHNIC-HEALTH@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2014 3:46 PM<br>Subject: HERAG's 1st Race Equality Think Tank: Call for proposals From Studenship to Professorship<br><br>Dear All<br><br>We are delighted to invite you to submit a proposal for HERAG's 1st Think Tank: Studentship to Professorship: mapping the gaps and making changes for BME staff and students, Monday 23rd June 2014. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-23T15:49:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>M & M Johnson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BME-HE-NETWORK;63d16f32.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
